articles.author: Mat Smith
articles.title: The Morning After: Samsung pays tribute to its flip phone past with limited-edition foldable
articles.description: Samsung has unveiled the Galaxy Z Flip 5 Retro, a limited-edition foldable that pays homage to the SGH-E700 (AKA the SGH-E715 in the US), which came out 20 years ago in 2003. It has the same indigo blue and silver color combo as the original and a few special…

articles.author: Nena Farrell
articles.title: Tivoli Pal BT Review: A Colorful Radio
articles.description: This radio is an expensive pop of fun for any tabletop, shelf, or even outdoor adventure.
articles.content:
I don't even like pink, but here I am with pink lights on my desk and PC lights to match. Can I blame Barbie for this? No. For that, I can point to the little radio on my desk: the Tivoli Pal BT.

articles.title: How to connect a Nest Thermostat to Apple Home through Matter
articles.description: The Nest Thermostat now works with Apple Home thanks to Matter. Follow this guide to set up and control Google’s smart thermostat in the Apple Home app.
